actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes (50% done)
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL indexes to automatically expire old data like logs or sessions, as listed in 'In Progress (This Sprint)' with 50% completion and target Week 2 Jan.
implementation_steps: Review existing partial indexes in MongoDB schema files.
Add TTL indexes for collections like logs or sessions (e.g., db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 }))
Test index creation and expiration behavior with sample data.
Update documentation and commit with sprint progress note.
